    • Method Detail

      • doCrossover

        public void doCrossover(Chromosome father)
        Non-homologous 1--point crossover. For each parent a single (different) X-point is randomly chosen. The genetic code from these X-points is swapped, hereby changing the length of the Chromosome.
        Overrides:
        doCrossover in class BitChromosome
        Parameters:
        father - a parent Chromosome (technically already a child).
